dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8720 IH: To prohibit the availability of funds for the Department of Defense for organizing, promoting, or hosting drag shows as a means of diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grothman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the availability of funds for the Department of Defense for organizing, promoting, or hosting drag shows as a means of diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

section.header: Prohibition on availability of funds for drag shows as part of diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives
section.text: None of the funds authorized to be appropriated or otherwise made available for the Department of Defense for any fiscal year may be obligated or expended to organize, promote, or host drag shows as a means of diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.
